languages.text: "Погибнуть как истинный защитник Империума — героическая смерть. Но продолжать жить во имя Человечества, думается мне, подвиг ничуть не меньший. Мужайтесь, господин проктор, не позволяйте этому месту уничтожить вас".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Стать последним героем Империума в этой преисподней — отчаянная, героическая смерть. Но продолжать жить во имя Человечества, думается мне, подвиг ничуть не меньший. Мужайтесь, господин проктор, не позволяйте этому месту уничтожить все лучшее в вас".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."
languages.original_text: "Погибнуть как истинный защитник Империума — героическая смерть. Но продолжать жить во имя Человечества, думается мне, подвиг ничуть не меньший. Мужайтесь, господин проктор, не позволяйте этому месту уничтожить вас".

traits.locale_text: "To die a true defender of Imperium is a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is a feat that is no less honourable. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

"To die a true defender of Imperium is a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is a feat that is no less honourable. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

"To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

"To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

"To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

"To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

languages.text: "Als wahrer Verteidiger des Imperiums zu sterben, bedeutet einen Heldentod. Aber im Namen der Menschheit weiterzuleben, ist eine nicht minder große Leistung, denke ich. Nur Mut, Proktor – lasst Euch von diesem Ort nicht zerstören."
languages.original_text: "To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

traits.locale_text: "Als wahrer Verteidiger des Imperiums zu sterben, bedeutet einen Heldentod. Aber im Namen der Menschheit weiterzuleben, ist eine nicht minder große Leistung, denke ich. Nur Mut, Proktor – lasst Euch von diesem Ort nicht zerstören."

languages.text: « Donner sa vie pour défendre l'Imperium est un acte héroïque. Mais je pense que continuer à vivre, au nom de l'Humanité, n'est pas moins honorable. Gardez courage, proctor. Ne laissez pas cet endroit vous détruire. »
languages.original_text: "To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

traits.locale_text: « Donner sa vie pour défendre l'Imperium est un acte héroïque. Mais je pense que continuer à vivre, au nom de l'Humanité, n'est pas moins honorable. Gardez courage, proctor. Ne laissez pas cet endroit vous détruire. »

languages.text: “为了捍卫帝国而死，这确实是光荣的死法，但在我看来，以人类的名义继续活下去，也同样是了不起的壮举。打起精神吧，监察官，别让这个地方毁了你。”
languages.original_text: "To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

traits.locale_text: “为了捍卫帝国而死，这确实是光荣的死法，但在我看来，以人类的名义继续活下去，也同样是了不起的壮举。打起精神吧，监察官，别让这个地方毁了你。”

languages.text: «Morir como auténtico defensor del Imperium es morir como un héroe, pero, a mi juicio, seguir viviendo en nombre de la Humanidad no es una proeza menos honorable. Fuerza, Procurador. No deje que este lugar le destruya».
languages.original_text: "To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

traits.locale_text: «Morir como auténtico defensor del Imperium es morir como un héroe, pero, a mi juicio, seguir viviendo en nombre de la Humanidad no es una proeza menos honorable. Fuerza, Procurador. No deje que este lugar le destruya».

languages.text: 「帝国の真の守護者として死ぬことは、英雄的な死を意味します。ですが、人類のために生き続けることも、それに劣らぬ名誉ある偉業だと私は思います。勇気を持ってください、代理人殿。この場所に心を蝕まれてはなりません」
languages.original_text: "To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の真の守護者として死ぬことは、英雄的な死を意味します。ですが、人類のために生き続けることも、それに劣らぬ名誉ある偉業だと私は思います。勇気を持ってください、代理人殿。この場所に心を蝕まれてはなりません」

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un gerçek bir savunucusu olarak ölmek kahramanca bir ölümdür. Gerçi İnsanlık adına yaşamaya devam etmek de en az o kadar onurlu bir başarıdır. Cesur ol Üsteğmen. Buranın seni yok etmesine izin verme."
languages.original_text: "To die a true defender of Imperium is to die a heroic death. But it seems to me that to carry on living in the name of Humanity is no less-honourable a feat. Take heart, Proctor — do not let this place destroy you."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk'un gerçek bir savunucusu olarak ölmek kahramanca bir ölümdür. Gerçi İnsanlık adına yaşamaya devam etmek de en az o kadar onurlu bir başarıdır. Cesur ol, Üsteğmen. Buranın seni yok etmesine izin verme."
